SEARCH
Package com.authentication.services

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
com.authentication.services.AuthService
@Service public class AuthService extends Object
This class handles all the business logic for the login, registration, forgot password, reset password and verify email for the user into the system to be used for whole server wide application.

  • Constructor Details

      public AuthService()

  • Method Details

    • register

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> register(AuthRequest authRequest)
      This method registers the user into system and starts verifying process for the user's account. On any Messaging exception occurring in sending the email to user. The user's data is deleted and InternalServerException is sent to the user.
      Parameters:
      authRequest - record containing email and password and pin(if provided)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ApiResponse object with String message, time the response have been sent, true for success and null for object.
      Throws:
      EmailAlreadyRegisteredException - for registering with email already registered in system.
      InternalServerException - for verify email link email not been able to be sent to the email address.

    • login

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> login(AuthRequest authRequest)
      This method is used for log in the user into the system.
      Parameters:
      authRequest - record containing email and password and pin(if provided)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ApiResponse object with String message, time the response have been sent, true for success and AuthResponse with jwt token.
      Throws:
      EmailNotRegisteredException - for attempting to log in with email not registered in system.
      EmailNotVerifiedException - for attempting to log in with email not verified by the system.
      InvalidLoginAttemptException - for attempting to log in with invalid email and password credentials.

    • getAllUsers

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> getAllUsers()
      This method is used gor getting all users stored in authentication-service. For ADMIN role only. Priority update this method for large amount of users.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ApiResponse object containing all users

    • forgotPassword

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> forgotPassword(String email)
      This method is used to initiate the forgot password routine by the user.
      Parameters:
      email - user's email address
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ApiResponse object with String message, time the response have been sent, true for success and null for object.
      Throws:
      EmailNotRegisteredException - for attempting to log in with email not registered in system.
      InternalServerException - for reset password link email not been able to be sent to the email address.

    • resetPassword

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> resetPassword(AuthRequest authRequest)
      This method is used to reset the user's password for the email.
      Parameters:
      authRequest - record containing email and password and pin(if provided)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ApiResponse object with String message, time the response have been sent, true for success and null for object. Unauthorized http code on if the user has not started the forgot password routine. Ok code if the link has expired or correct code processing.
      Throws:
      EmailNotRegisteredException - for attempting to use email not registered in system for resetting password.
      InternalServerException - for reset password link email not been able to be sent to the email address.

    • verifyEmail

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> verifyEmail(String email, String token)
      This method is used to verify the user's email.
      Parameters:
      email - user's email address
      token - verification token
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ApiResponse object with String message, time the response have been sent, true for success and null for object. Unauthorized http code on if the user has unknowingly accessed this endpoint. Bad-Request cde if the verification link is expired or tampered token. Ok code if the user is already verified or on success.
      Throws:
      EmailNotRegisteredException - for attempting to use email not registered in system for resetting password.
